title: 部署上线流程
situation: Coordinating a deployment. You need to confirm CI/CD pipeline and rollback steps.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 这次发版走CI/CD吗？还是手动部署？
turns.pinyin: Zhè cì fā bǎn zǒu CI/CD ma? Háishì shǒudòng bùshǔ?
turns.translation: Is this release going through CI/CD or manual deploy?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 走Jenkins流水线，构建完自动跑单元测试，通过才部署到 staging。
turns.pinyin: Zǒu Jenkins liúshuǐxiàn, gòujiàn wán zìdòng pǎo dānyuán cèshì, tōngguò cái bùshǔ dào staging.
turns.translation: Jenkins pipeline — after build it runs unit tests, only deploys to staging if they pass.
suggestions: 走Jenkins流水线，构建完自动跑单元测试，通过才部署到staging。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 生产环境是蓝绿部署还是金丝雀？
turns.pinyin: Shēngchǎn huánjìng shì lán lǜ bùshǔ háishì jīnsīquè?

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 金丝雀，先切百分之五的流量，观察 metrics 没问题再全量。
turns.pinyin: Jīnsīquè, xiān qiē bǎi fēn zhī wǔ de liúliàng, guānchá metrics méi wèntí zài quán liàng.
turns.translation: Canary — route 5% traffic first, check metrics, then full rollout.
suggestions: 金丝雀，先切百分之五的流量，观察metrics没问题再全量。
